definition: belligerence aroused by a real or supposed wrong (personified as one of the deadly sins), to make angry
details:
noun
- belligerence aroused by a real or supposed wrong (personified as one of the deadly sins)
= synonyms: wrath
- a strong emotion
= synonyms: ire, choler
- the state of being angry
= synonyms: angriness
verb
- to make angry
= example: to make angry
- to become angry
= example: to become angry
= synonyms: see red
